alert.note: Alert for Divide; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 6:11AM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow ending. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph causing reduced visibility in blowing snow. Deep snow drifts. * WHERE...Divide and Williams counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST Tuesday. For the first Winter Weather Advisory and second Winter Weather Advisory, until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads. Blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you are outside be sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
